headline: Does Recent PepsiCo Rally Signal a Shift in Market Sentiment for 2025?
summary: If you have been pondering what your next move should be with PepsiCo stock, you are not alone. With the company’s reputation as a consumer staples giant, many investors naturally turn to PEP during times of market uncertainty or for stable long-term growth. Yet based on recent price action, there is plenty to look at for both optimists and skeptics. PepsiCo’s share price has seen some volatility over the past year, slipping roughly 12% in total return, even as the broader market has pushed...
